header_text: This year, we come together to celebrate the union as we innovate the possibilities of a sustainable tomorrow.
paragraph_text: Let’s celebrate sustainably through our parades, celebration zones and other festivities across the seven emirates.
header_2: NATION'S SPIRIT THROUGH A DAZZLING ARRAY OF NATIONAL DAY EVENTS, PARADES AND MORE.

participate_subheading: Whether you’re at home, school,  office, or in a parades, there’s always a way to celebrate consciously and sustainably.
img_title: Home is where the heart is
tx_area_description: Celebrate the spirit of unity and 52 years of the UAE at home. Inspire others by reducing waste, using recycled materials and honouring our cherished bond with our environment. These downloadables will guide you in your celebrations at home for the 52nd UAE Union Day.
school_heading: Our children are the actionists of tomorrow.
school_description: What we learn in school stays with us for the rest of our lives. We can spread the spirit of harmony with our environment to our young children who will become the future of our nation. These downloadables will guide you in your celebrations in school for the 52nd UAE Union Day.
school_img_title: Sowing the seeds for a brighter future
office_heading: Creating a legacy for the future
office_description: As the nation gets together to celebrate 52 years of the UAE, we also honour the achievements of our workplaces, where incredible growth is nurtured every single day. We can use our limitless talents to instill the values of the UAE in our workplaces, by making the right choices for our environment and our people. These downloadables will guide you in your celebrations in your workplaces for the 52nd UAE Union Day.
office_img_title: Make mindful choices the cornerstone of your values
celeberation_zones_description: Our Celebration Zones are hubs of festivity and inclusivity for people of all backgrounds to celebrate together the 52nd UAE Union Day. By reducing and recycling our waste, and always keeping the environment in mind, we can honour the legacy of our heritage and history in the spirit of unity. These downloadables will guide you in your celebrations in the dedicated Celebration Zones for the 52nd UAE Union Day.
celebration_zones_img_title: Together we can honour the legacy of our ancestors
parades_heading: Walking together for a brighter future
parades_description: In our collective festivities, we celebrate the diversity and excellence of our people from all walks of life. These parades are a reminder of our deep-rooted bond with our land and each other, which we nurture through mindful consumption and reducing waste. These downloadables will guide you in your celebrations in the parades for the 52nd UAE Union Day.
parades_img_title: Our parades are a symbol of our unity and inclusivity

answer_1: Celebrating consciously means to make sure that we minimise our waste, recycle or upcycle what we already have, and reuse our resources as much as possible during our celebration for the 52nd Union Day.
answer_2: The 52nd Union Day celebrations are accompanied with guides on how to celebrate whether you’re at home, school,  office, or in parades, there’s always a way to celebrate consciously and sustainably.
question_3: Why is the UAE celebrating Union Day sustainably?
answer_3: The UAE and its people have always nurtured an enduring bond with the land and the sea, which is a deep-rooted part of its culture, history and heritage. This year, the UAE is strengthening its commitment to creating a sustainable, prosperous and equitable future for all by extending the ethos of sustainability to Union Day celebrations.
question_4: Can I learn more about the 52nd UAE Union day?
answer_4: We invite everyone who calls the UAE home to celebrate the 52nd Union Day as the world unites in the UAE for a future of sustainable flourishing. The celebrations will highlight the UAE's remarkable sustainability journey, spanning from its union in 1971 to the present day, showcased through its cultural legacy, heritage, and its people, who have always embodied a spirit of innovation and collective action.
question_5: Who is responsible for the 52nd UAE Union day celebrations?
answer_5: The Organising Committee of the 52nd UAE Union Day Celebrations was formed to oversee this year's official celebrations. The Committee is chaired by His Highness Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed Al Nahyan, with Her Highness Sheikha Mariam bint Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan as Vice Chair. The committee is tasked with developing and executing the official ceremony, in addition to various nation-wide activations for the public across the UAE, which include parades, celebration zones, and school programming.
question_6: Is there any way to contact you?
answer_6: You can contact us by sending your inquiry to: contact@unionday.ae. Alternatively, you can join the conversation on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok and YouTube @UAEUnionDay.
question_7: Any social media guidelines and templates to use for the artwork?
answer_7: You can download our official logos and brand guidelines from the link below, We only ask that you adhere to our usage guidelines. For more information, please contact  brand@unionday.ae

contact_description: We value your input as we strive to create an open and enriching experience for all participants. Please use the form below to contact us about your thoughts and questions about UAE 52nd Union Day. We welcome your feedback.
abtCelebration: This year is different, ITs going to be SUSTAINABLE! aND Celebrations will happen ALL OVER the UAE
abtdetail1: This year, the UAE invites everyone who calls the UAE home to come together to celebrate and innovate the possibilities of a prosperous, equitable and sustainable tomorrow.
abtdetail2: For our 52nd Union Day, we celebrate the actionists of today while honouring the legacy of our ancestors
abtdetail3: This year's official ceremony will showcase actionists from the UAE and around the world who are pioneering multi-sectoral sustainable change and honouring the nation's rich tangible and intangible heritage.
abtCelebrationDetail1: Our celebrations echo our commitment to the planet.
abtCelebrationDetail2: We unite in a nationwide sustainable celebration.
abtCelebrationDetail3: Our celebrations echo our commitment to the planet. We unite in a nationwide sustainable celebration. Parades, festivities, and joy, all with a touch of green. Let's celebrate, sustainably
abt20231: Our festivities across the UAE unite everyone
abt20232: who calls the UAE home in celebration of the UAE’s 52 years of innovation, ambition and progress
abtSubText1: In anticipation of the 52nd Union Day ceremony on December 2, the celebrations will bring together everyone who calls the UAE home through various nation-wide activations including parades, public celebration zones, and school programming.
abtSubText2: The Organising Committee of the 52nd UAE Union Day Celebrations was formed to oversee this year's official celebrations. The Committee is chaired by His Highness Sheikh Abdullah bin Zayed Al Nahyan, with Her Highness Sheikha Mariam bint Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan as Vice Chair. The committee is tasked with developing and executing the official ceremony, in addition to various nation-wide activations for the public across the UAE, which include parades, celebration zones, and school activations.
actRecap: Revisit our previous Union Day celebrations
act_dec2022: The 51st UAE Union Day Official Ceremony took us on a generational journey of the UAE’s inspiring pioneers as we embark on our collective future towards 2071.
act_dec2021: The 50th UAE Union Day Official Ceremony, the Golden Jubilee, highlighted the deep connections between people, nature and technology.
actTheme2020: Al Jubail Mangrove Park in Abu Dhabi
act_dec2020: The 49th UAE Union Day Official Ceremony revolved around the growth of a seed into a full bloom, mirroring the journey of the UAE in 49 years, told through a striking revolving, cubic sculpture with projected visuals.
actTheme2019: Zayed Sports City Stadium, Abu Dhabi
act_dec2019: The 48th UAE Union Day Official Ceremony named 'Legacy of Our Ancestors' the show embodies the heritage of our forefathers as a beacon to usher the way for future generations.
dec404: Something went wrong. It looks like the link is broken or the page has been removed.
terms_content:
Welcome to www.unionday.ae

These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of the UAE Union Day’s Website, located at www.unionday.ae

By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use unionday.ae if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.

Submitted Content

By submitting content (text, audio, video, and images) in any form on www.unionday.ae, you agreed that this content, without prior notice to you, may be used, reproduced, and edited to be displayed on the website and the social media accounts of the UAE Union Day and any of its partners. This includes but is not limited to www.unionday.ae, Instagram, Youtube, Twitter and Facebook.

Cookies

We employ the use of cookies. By accessing unionday.ae, you agreed to use cookies in agreement with the UAE Union Day’s Privacy Policy.

Most interactive websites use cookies to let us retrieve the user’s details for each visit. Cookies are used by our website to enable the functionality of certain areas to make it easier for people visiting our website. Some of our affiliate/advertising partners may also use cookies.

License

Unless otherwise stated, the UAE Union Day and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on unionday.ae. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from unionday.ae for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions.

You must not:

  • Republish material from unionday.ae
  • Sell, rent or sub-license material from unionday.ae
  • Reproduce, duplicate or copy material from unionday.ae
  • Redistribute content from unionday.ae

This Agreement shall begin on the date hereof.

Parts of this website offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information in certain areas of the website. The UAE Union Day does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of the UAE Union Day, its agents and/or affiliates. Comments reflect the views and opinions of the person who post their views and opinions. To the extent permitted by applicable laws, the UAE Union Day shall not be liable for the Comments or for any liability, damages or expenses caused and/or suffered as a result of any use of and/or posting of and/or appearance of the Comments on this website.

the UAE Union Day reserves the right to monitor all Comments and to remove any Comments which can be considered inappropriate, offensive or causes breach of these Terms and Conditions.

You warrant and represent that:

  • You are entitled to post the Comments on our website and have all necessary licenses and consents to do so;
  • The Comments do not invade any intellectual property right, including without limitation copyright, patent or trademark of any third party;
  • The Comments do not contain any defamatory, libelous, offensive, indecent or otherwise unlawful material which is an invasion of privacy
  • The Comments will not be used to solicit or promote business or custom or present commercial activities or unlawful activity.

You hereby grant the UAE Union Day a non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, edit and authorize others to use, reproduce and edit any of your Comments in any and all forms, formats or media.

Hyperlinking to our content

The following organizations may link to our Website without prior written approval:

  • Government agencies;
  • Search engines;
  • News organizations;
  • Online directory distributors may link to our Website in the same manner as they hyperlink to the Websites of other listed businesses; and
  • System wide Accredited Businesses except soliciting non-profit organizations, charity shopping malls, and charity fundraising groups which may not hyperlink to our Web site.

These organizations may link to our home page, to publications or to other Website information so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products and/or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party’s site.

We may consider and approve other link requests from the following types of organizations:

  • commonly-known consumer and/or business information sources;
  • dot.com community sites;
  • associations or other groups representing charities;
  • online directory distributors;
  • internet portals;
  • accounting, law and consulting firms; and
  • educational institutions and trade associations.

We will approve link requests from these organizations if we decide that: (a) the link would not make us look unfavorably to ourselves or to our accredited businesses; (b) the organization does not have any negative records with us; (c) the benefit to us from the visibility of the hyperlink compensates the absence of the UAE Union Day; and (d) the link is in the context of general resource information.

These organizations may link to our home page so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party’s site.

If you are one of the organizations listed in paragraph 2 above and are interested in linking to our website, you must inform us by sending an e-mail to the UAE Union Day. Please include your name, your organization name, contact information as well as the URL of your site, a list of any URLs from which you intend to link to our Website, and a list of the URLs on our site to which you would like to link. Wait 2-3 weeks for a response.

Approved organizations may hyperlink to our Website as follows:

  • By use of our corporate name; or
  • By use of the uniform resource locator being linked to; or
  • By use of any other description of our Website being linked to that makes sense within the context and format of content on the linking party’s site.

No use of the UAE Union Day’s logo or other artwork will be allowed for linking absent a trademark license agreement.

iFrames

Without prior approval and written permission, you may not create frames around our Webpages that alter in any way the visual presentation or appearance of our Website.

Content Liability

We shall not be hold responsible for any content that appears on your Website. You agree to protect and defend us against all claims that is rising on your Website. No link(s) should appear on any Website that may be interpreted as libelous, obscene or criminal, or which infringes, otherwise violates, or advocates the infringement or other violation of, any third party rights.

Reservation rights

We reserve the right to request that you remove all links or any particular link to our Website. You approve to immediately remove all links to our Website upon request. We also reserve the right to amend these terms and conditions and its linking policy at any time. By continuously linking to our Website, you agree to be bound to and follow these linking terms and conditions.

Removal links from website

If you find any link on our Website that is offensive for any reason, you are free to contact and inform us any moment. We will consider requests to remove links but we are not obligated to or so or to respond to you directly.

We do not ensure that the information on this website is correct, we do not warrant its completeness or accuracy; nor do we promise to ensure that the website remains available or that the material on the website is kept up to date.

Disclaimer

To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, we exclude all representations, warranties and conditions relating to our website and the use of this website. Nothing in this disclaimer will:

  • limit or exclude our or your liability for death or personal injury;
  • limit or exclude our or your liability for fraud or fraudulent misrepresentation;
  • limit any of our or your liabilities in any way that is not permitted under applicable law; or
  • exclude any of our or your liabilities that may not be excluded under applicable law.

The limitations and prohibitions of liability set in this Section and elsewhere in this disclaimer: (a) are subject to the preceding paragraph; and (b) govern all liabilities arising under the disclaimer, including liabilities arising in contract, in tort and for breach of statutory duty.
heading_init: JOIN US IN CELEBRATING THE 2023 OFFICIAL 52ND UAE NATIONAL DAY
heading_f0: THE RICH TAPESTRY OF A NATION
cta1_f0: Scroll up and down to explore the story
heading_f1: As custodians of nature, the little freshwater they had was diverted with the Falaj to cultivate the soil.
sub_text_f1: This allowed them to farm across the desert, creating thriving oases by nurturing the land.
heading_f2: The sea gave them fish and pearls, which evolved into trade and essential resource gathering.
heading_f3_1: They noticed the stars and the changing of the seasons.
sub_text_f3_1: Al Duroor calendar–a celestial guide created to farm, fish, and harvest together, as one.
heading_f3_2: Resourceful by nature, they’ve made much with little
sub_text_f3_2: Palm tree fronds and coral from the sea allowed them to build permanent shelter and fortify towns.
sub_text_f3_3: They collaborated with each other and started building the first towns on the land.
heading_f3_4: Cities became hubs of trade and commerce
sub_text_f3_4: Minds young and old thrived, communities settled and welcomed the world.
heading_f4_1: Then in 1971, the Emirates united seven leaders under a nation whose north star is its people.
sub_text_f4_1: Our Founding Father brought us together under one nation, sowing the seeds of unity and hope.
heading_f4_2: With new resources and a young nation, they’ve had a fresh start.
sub_text_f4_2: As whole cities sprung from sand, they gave people comfort by establishing schools and hospitals.
heading_f4_3: Leaders and communities worked in unity to preserve the land.
sub_text_f4_3: Rewilding of indigenous wildlife began, alongside reforms to protect the ecosystems of our land.
heading_f4_4: Together, they planted a union of endless possibilities.
sub_text_f4_4: In turn, giving us the hope and courage to make the unimagined possible.
heading_f5: We open our arms to those who dare to dream with us!
sub_text_f5: Let us weave together a tapestry of sustainable flourishing, and redesign our way of life.
heading_f6: Now, as we mark 52 years of a nation home to over 200 nationalities, let's co-create an equitable and sustainable future for all.
heading_f3: They noticed the stars and the changing of the seasons.
sub_text_f3: The Al Duroor calendar–a celestial guide created to farm, fish, and harvest together, as one.
